sentence.Network_en: He sat mute, speechless with ecstasy, gazing into the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 他静静坐着，凝视天空，一言不发，心驰神往。

sentence.Network_en: The little boy was speechless with shock.
sentence.Network_cn: 那小男孩惊得说不出话来。

sentence.Network_en: Alex was almost speechless with rage and despair.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚历克斯又生气又绝望，几乎说不出话来。

list.abs: 沪江博客 - 和猫猫一起学习 ... I’m full. 我吃饱了。 I'm speechless. 我无话可说。 It slipped. 我说漏嘴了。.
the patient was speechless but still sensible ., 病人虽然不能说话但仍然有知觉.
Her frown gave him a speechless message ., 她眉头一皱给了他一个暗示.
The girls were rendered quite speechless by the miracle ., 姑娘们被眼前的奇迹惊得瞠目结舌.

encyclopedia.content: SPEECHLESS（无以言表）出自2001年专辑《Invincible》 。是一首浪漫的情歌

entry.def: If you are speechless, you are temporarily unable to speak, usually because something has shocked you.

example.ex: Alex was almost speechless with rage and despair.
example.tran: 亚历克斯又生气又绝望，几乎说不出话来。

means.word_mean: (由于强烈的感情、震惊等)说不出话的

sentences.en: He was almost speechless with anger.
sentences.cn: 他气得几乎说不出话来。
雷切尔站在那儿一言不发。

sentences.en: The leaders of the Kopper Company were then stunned speechless.
sentences.cn: 科伯公司的领导们当时被惊得目瞪口呆。
